1.title: Planet Hulk: Part 1

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

1.plot: While looking for a way back to Earth, the Hulks discover the Leader stowed away on board the ship. Retribution must wait as the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. have to fight Ronan the Accuser and his Kree soldiers to save an old foe: Ego the Living Planet. But when Galactus comes to consume Ego the Living Planet, the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. must put themselves at risk to save the lives of their two enemies.

2.title: Planet Hulk: Part 2

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

2.plot: The Agents of S.M.A.S.H. must work together with Ego the Living Planet to fight with Galactus and his latest herald Firelord.

3.title: Hulking Commandos

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

3.plot: On Halloween, the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. encounter Nick Fury's Howling Commandos where they have been sent by Nick Fury to apprehend the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. The Howling Commandos have a change of plans when they end up helping the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. prevent Dormammu from breaking into Earth's dimension and turning all of humanity into Mindless Ones.

4.title: Fear Itself

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

4.plot: The Hulks must face each of their greatest fears in order to stop the Null from crossing through a worm hole to reap ruin upon Earth.

5.title: Guardians of the Galaxy

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

5.plot: Upon being lured to an unnamed planet, the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. team up with their old friends the Guardians of the Galaxy to stop Super-Skrull and the Skrulls from using the Agents of S.M.A.S.H.'s gamma energy to create gamma-powered Skrulls in their latest plot to invade Earth.

6.title: Future Shock

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

6.plot: The Hulks finally return to Earth only to discover that they're centuries too late! The High Evolutionary devolved all humans into primitive beasts, and devolves the Hulks too!

7.title: A Druff Is Enough

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

7.plot: A-Bomb brings a cute alien aboard the ship despite Hulk's warnings against it. When the alien starts to multiply and take over, A-Bomb lies about disobeying Hulk's order.

8.title: Homecoming

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

8.plot: The Agents of S.M.A.S.H. returns to Earth with Leader still in their possession even though they were blamed for the destruction of Vista Verde following the incident by Leader's Agents of C.R.A.S.H. They find Vista Verde under the rule of Abomination (who was pardoned and reinstated into the U.S. Army) upon learning this from Mayor Stan and finding Hulkbusters that are under his command. Now the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. must liberate Vista Verde and defeat Abomination before he can use one of Thunderbolt Ross' old weapons in his plan to attack other nations.

9.title: Spidey, I Blew Up the Dinosaur

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

9.plot: While being pursued by the military, the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. go after Leader when he steals all the confiscated weapons from their vault. When Devil Dinosaur is enlarged and let loose by Leader, the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. team up with Spider-Man to stop Devil Dinosaur and restore him to normal size.

10.title: The Strongest One There Is

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

10.plot: A-Bomb starts to doubt his strength as an Agent of S.M.A.S.H. and must learn to use his other attributes against the incredibly strong Xemnu, an intergalactic fighting champion, for the fate of Earth.

11.title: The Dopplesmashers

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

11.plot: When the Hulks are framed by Abomination for attacking the S.H.I.E.L.D. Tri-Carrier, they must face evil gamma-powered doppelgangers to save Nick Fury.

12.title: The Big Green Mile

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

12.plot: The Hulks are locked up by Abomination in the same super villain prison where many of their enemies now reside. Can the Hulks escape and prove their innocence?

13.title: The Green Room

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

13.plot: Upon S.H.I.E.L.D. exonerating them from the frame-up in Vista Verde caused by the Agents of C.R.A.S.H., the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. track the Leader to a deserted island. They get stuck in a deadly maze (which Leader improved on Thunderbolt Ross' plans in his earlier fight with Hulk) where Hulk's rage is drained from him, making him mellowed out. After the rest of his teammates are captured, Hulk finds them in Leader's clutches at the center of the maze where Leader uses his machine to manifest Hulk's dark side in the physical form of Dark Hulk.

14.title: The Defiant Hulks

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

14.plot: Hulk reluctantly fills in as Mayor of Vista Verde, while Red and Skaar leave the team to start their own webcast as supper villain bounty hunters.

15.title: Enter, The Maestro

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

15.plot: While saving Earth from a potentially catastrophic meteorite, the Hulks come face to face with a future version of Hulk called Maestro who might not be the hero they think he is. The rest of the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. are unaware of Maestro's true plans until they encounter a future A-Bomb.

16.title: The Tale of Hercules

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

16.plot: The Hulks team up with Hercules to stop Pluto from turning everyone on Earth to stone.

17.title: Banner Day

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

17.plot: With help from Betty Ross, Hulk allows himself to be turned back into Bruce Banner. Bruce Banner then struggles with the decision when Ronan the Accuser launches a Kree attack on Earth.

18.title: Wheels of Fury

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

18.plot: The Agents of S.M.A.S.H. help Iron Man subdue Mainframe in a gladiatorial roller derby game for the fate of the planet. However, only one of the Hulks knows how to skate.

19.title: Days of Future Smash, Part 1: The Dino Era

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

19.plot: Hulk chases Leader back in time to the Jurassic era, but their actions result in present Earth being taken over by dinosaurs! Hulk battles Leader in the past to save all of time.

20.title: Days of Future Smash, Part 2: Smashguard

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

20.plot: Hulk follows Leader back in time to the Viking Era and teams up with young Thor and Loki. The Agents of S.M.A.S.H. fight to stop "All Father" Leader from taking over the planet.

21.title: Days of Future Smash, Part 3: Dracula

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

21.plot: Hulk pursues Leader back in time to the Victorian era and unites the Howling Commandos against Dracula, who wants to shroud the Earth with Leader's gamma cloud.

22.title: Days of Future Smash, Part 4: The Hydra Years

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

22.plot: Chasing Leader through time to World War II, Hulk teams up with a young Captain America to stop Red Skull who becomes Green Skull when enhanced with gamma energy by Leader. In the present, the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. team up with an old Captain America to fight and free the world from HYDRA which is led by Leader and operating a device that is powered by Green Skull.

23.title: Days of Future Smash, Part 5: The Tomorrow Smashers

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

23.plot: Finally catching up to Leader in the present, Hulk reunites with the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. But, he's unexpectedly whisked into the future to battle a Leader threat.

24.title: Spirit of Vengeance

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

24.plot: While escorting Abomination to stand trial for his crimes, the Hulks run into Ghost Rider, who has come to make both Abomination and Red atone for their past bad deeds.

25.title: Planet Monster: Part 1

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

25.plot: A Kree armada led by the Supreme Intelligence who is invading in retaliation for Ronan the Accuser's incarceration. When the Kree free Ronan the Accuser and Leader, Hulk is torn between his two teams the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. and the Avengers where both groups fight to prevent the Kree from destroying Earth.

26.title: Planet Monster: Part 2

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

26.plot: The Agents of S.M.A.S.H. and the Avengers must work together to free Hulk from the Super Intelligence and prevent the destruction of Earth.

1.title: Doorway to Destruction Part 1

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

1.plot: Hulk's best pal Rick Jones begins making a web-series to show the world Hulk is a hero, and Big Green gets his first chance to prove it when Annihilus invades Earth.

2.title: Doorway to Destruction Part 2

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

2.plot: The newly formed Agents of S.M.A.S.H. - including a Hulked out Rick Jones, aka A-Bomb - invade the Negative Zone to stop Annihilus once and for all.

3.title: Hulk-Busted

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

3.plot: When the Leader hijacks Iron Man's Hulkbuster suits to destroy the Agents of S.M.A.S.H., the team and Iron Man must learn to trust each other and work together to defeat the Leader.

4.title: The Collector

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

4.plot: Perceived by the public as "menaces," Hulk and Spider-Man are the only ones left to save the planet from destruction when The Collector captures every last hero on earth.

5.title: All About the Ego

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

5.plot: The Hulks face their biggest foe yet when they travel into space to battle Ego the Living Planet, who threatens to tear Earth apart. To survive, they have to tackle the second biggest ego in the galaxy - Red Hulk's.

6.title: Savage Land

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

6.plot: A-Bomb is eager to prove himself to an over-protective Hulk and finds an unlikely mentor in Red, but when Sauron and his army of dinosaurs begin to flood Earth with lava, A-Bomb finds himself facing a true trial by fire.

7.title: Incredible Shrinking Hulks

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

7.plot: A-Bomb's birthday calls for a celebratory game of mini-golf, but thanks to the Leader, it's the Hulks who are miniaturized. Now the one-inch heroes must stop the towering Leader from shrinking every city on Earth.

8.title: Hulks on Ice

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

8.plot: The Hulks join forces with Thor to stop Laufey and his army of frost giants from freezing the world solid.

9.title: Of Moles and Men

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

9.plot: Believing his presence in Vista Verde is putting its citizens in danger, Hulk goes underground and becomes savior to the Moloids, but it may be Hulk who needs the saving.

10.title: Wendigo Apocalypse

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

10.plot: When the curse of the Wendigo begins spreading across the team, The Hulks fight their way out of a real live horror movie, starting with Hulks old rival Wolverine.

11.title: The Skaar Whisperer

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

11.plot: Skaar gets a lesson in civility from Doc Sampson while the Hulks battle Absorbing Man, who takes on Gamma Energy to turn himself into an unstoppable force.

12.title: Into the Negative Zone

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

12.plot: Hulk begrudgingly teams up with The Thing to take the fight to the Leader's doorstep when his arch nemesis puts the lives of the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. on the line.

13.title: Red Rover

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

13.plot: An irritated Red Hulk accidentally drops Devil Dinosaur in Dr. Doom's backyard, prompting the mad dictator to launch a full assault on the Hulks.

14.title: The Venom Within

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

14.plot: Hulk has to save the day when his friends are possessed by Venom and rampage through New York City to destroy Spider-Man.

15.title: Galactus Goes Green

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

15.plot: Galactus comes to Earth looking for a new herald and settles on the under-appreciated She-Hulk.

16.title: The Trouble with Machines

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

16.plot: The Hulks have crashed their Jump Jet more times than they can count, and it's out for revenge now that the Leader has given it artificial intelligence.

17.title: Abomination

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

17.plot: A villain from Red Hulk's past takes out the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. one-by-one to exact revenge and frame the team for destroying Vista Verde.

18.title: Mission Impossible Man

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

18.plot: The Hulks' biggest fan Impossible Man also proves to be their biggest problem when he summons the giant dragon Fing Fang Foom to battle them.

19.title: For Asgard

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

19.plot: The Hulks team up with Heimdall to take down Malekith the Accursed.

20.title: Stranger in a Strange Land

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

20.plot: To help the aspiring magician A-Bomb get a lesson in hard work, Hulk puts him under the tutelage of the Sorcerer Supreme, Doctor Strange. But when the dreaded Dormammu abducts his teacher, A-Bomb has to use what he learned to save Earth.

21.title: Deathlok

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

21.plot: When the Hulks thwart a villain from attacking a girl in the mall, they unintentionally start an alien invasion Deathlok was sent to stop.

22.title: Inhuman Nature

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

22.plot: A-Bomb's crush on a mysterious girl leads the Hulks to the secret home of the Inhumans, an isolationist race that threatens to wipe out mankind.

23.title: The Hunted

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

23.plot: Annoyed with his fellow Hulks, Hulk takes off for some alone time and stumbles onto an island of monsters where he inherits a family that's far peskier than his own.

24.title: Monsters No More

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

24.plot: The world finally accepts the Hulks as heroes, but before they can enjoy their success, a surprise attack from The Leader and his agents of CRASH threaten to destroy Vista Verde and the Hulk's reputation.

25.title: Planet Leader

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

25.plot: Following the incident caused by the Agents of C.R.A.S.H., the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. get transported to Skaar's home planet Sakaar where they must stop Leader from controlling the entire planet and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. themselves.

26.title: It's a Wonderful Smash

episode of.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. (TV Series 2013–2015)

26.plot: The Agents of S.M.A.S.H. and the Guardians of the Galaxy must break free of a simulated paradise created by the Collector.

imdb.title: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H.
plot: The Incredible Hulk teams up with Red Hulk, She-Hulk, Skaar, and Rick Jones aka A-Bomb to battle the forces of evil in front of cameras for Rick's web-based series to show the Hulk is more hero than monster.::Anonymous
synopsis:
Hulk has long fought alone to protect a world that sees him as a monster, but his friend Rick Jones has taken it upon himself to film the world-saving exploits of Big Green and his team to change that image.
In this never before seen team up of Hulk, his cousin She-Hulk, A-Bomb, Red Hulk and Skaar, Marvel's mightiest super heroes form an eccentric family living under one roof, working together to tackle threats that are too enormous for other heroes to handle. From trying to house break their giant red pet T-Rex to stopping Ego the Living Planet from crashing into the Earth, the Agents of S.M.A.S.H. must learn to balance Hulk-sized action with everyday family-sized problems.
